tilegame

Class TileGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • tilegame.TileGame

  • public class TileGame
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that creates the logic for the tile game. Constructs an instance of the game and takes in both players hand and returns the outcome of the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TileGame(Hand firstHand, Hand secondHand)
      Constructs the board and stores player 1 and player 2 hands

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getResults()
      Return results of the game as a multi-line String containing the final board, both both player's final hands, and the winner.
      void play()
      Players 1 and players 2 hand will continue to move and be rotated until a hand is empty.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TileGame

        public TileGame(Hand firstHand,
                Hand secondHand)
        Constructs the board and stores player 1 and player 2 hands
        Parameters:
        firstHand - player's 1 hand
        secondHand - player's 2 hand

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play()
        Players 1 and players 2 hand will continue to move and be rotated until a hand is empty.

      • getResults

        public java.lang.String getResults()
        Return results of the game as a multi-line String containing the final board, both both player's final hands, and the winner.
        Returns:
        a multi-line string with the outcome of the game
